info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Berkshire, northeastern Columbia and southeastern Rensselaer Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Nassau to near Hawley. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Chatham, Nassau, Adams, Lee, Lenox, Cheshire, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Becket, Austerlitz, Hancock, Savoy, New Ashford, Berkshire, Dalton, Lanesborough, Hinsdale, Canaan and Richmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
